name: Contingency XR-3C
description:
Contingency XR-3C is a first-person puzzle shooter in virtual reality. Armed with a special Multi Function Combat Device, make your way through the simulation to stop the spread of the corrupted robot prototypes before they escape the lab.

Controls:

Left joystick/trackpad - Move (Smooth locomotion only, sorry)

Trigger - Shoot

Grip - Grab

Right A/Right Menu  - Change laser type (when available)

The game has been tested on WMR and Index, so hopefully it'll function well on everything else.
